thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 62 of 7211
thread.title: Colin

author: Colin
title: Colin
text: Had a few chat sessions about some questions i had about shipping and warranties on a TV since i was purchasing from Canada. All reps were courteous, informative and prompt in their responses. The prices here are excellent ... beating anything I had researched right here locally, even when taking into account customs and shipping! Well pleased.Will update about shipping etc when I receive product.
